title: MsgObs
description: The GPS observations message reports all the raw pseudorange and carrier phase observations for the satellites being tracked by the device. Carrier phase observation here is represented as a 40-bit fixed point number with Q32.8 layout (i.e. 32-bits of whole cycles and 8-bits of fractional cycles). The observations are be interoperable with 3rd party receivers and conform with typical RTCMv3 GNSS observations.
